category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 16 (Approval for Temporary Use)
contents: Article 16 (Approval for temporary use) ① The head of the athletes' village comprehensively reviews the athletes' village operation schedule and conditions of the athletes' village facilities and notifies the applicant whether temporary use of the facility is approved. ② When approving temporary use, the athlete village head may impose conditions for the applicant to comply with Table 2 and use the facility.
